content: tea rose slip on based on a 1930s pattern for a short sleeved afternoon blouse in super bulky weight yarn a drop stitch and garter stitch pattern create an interesting yoke detail retro claude tea rose slip on materials abbreviations 250g 300g 350g 400g 450g 500g k=knit drops snow from garnstudio super p=purl bulky weight approximately 250m st=stitch 295m 340m 380m 425m 460m sts=stitches decrease=together 12mm knitting needles i recommend increase=increase by working into front and circular needles as this garment back of stitch becomes very heavy sl=slip gauge notes on pattern 9sts to 4 10cm and 12 row to this pattern is designed to be worn 4 10cm on 12mm needles with approximately 4-6 of negative ease size guide to work 1 long sts in next stitch wind the yarn twice around the needle while s m l xl 2xl 3xl working each stitch bust 34- 38- 42- 46- 50- 54- in 36 40 44 48 52 56 bust 86 - 96 106 116 126 136 cm 91 - - - - - 101 111 121 131 141 finished bust measurement s m l xl 2xl 3xl 30 25 33 75 39 42 5 46 25 49 75 76 8 85 7 99 108 117 5 126 4 cm cm cm cm cm cm 1 retro claude tea rose slip on body knit it one working only on the last piece 16 19 20 22 23 25 sts sl1 k15 18 19 21 22 24 for rib cast on 24 30 34 38 42 46 sts k1 11 13 15 17 19 21 row ending at neck p1 rib for 4 edge break yarn increase for back torso k2 1 3 1 2 4 with right side up rejoin yarn to increase in next stitch *k1 2 2 3 3 3 increase in remaining sts at neck edge sl1 next stitch repeat from * 8 times more k15 18 19 21 22 24 for knit to end 34 40 44 48 52 56 sts purl 12 14 16 18 20 22 row 1 row work stocking stitch 1 row knit 1 row sl1 k15 18 19 21 22 24 cast on purl until work measures 10 10 12 12 14 14 sts across neck 12 12 12 5 12 5 13 13 from cast on opening k16 19 20 22 23 25 sts from edge ending with a purl row first shoulder 42 48 52 56 60 64 sts cast on for yoke cast on 4 sts knit to knit 2 row this makes end 9 10 11 12 13 14 garter ridges across cast on 4 sts purl to end the shoulders 42 48 52 56 60 64 sts work open work pattern for 4 row work 2 row stocking stitch ending creating 2 stripes with a purl row front torso change to stocking stitch commence open work pattern work 2 row cast o� 4 sts at the beginning of the k1 *work 1 long sts in next
